languages.text: После Неумирающий молвил — и слова сии надлежит хранить в сердце, как величайшую молитву, ибо наисвятейшим пребывает их исток: "Я знаю тебя, Домин. Знаю твое сердце".

Then the Undying One spoke — and these words are to be preserved in your heart as the greatest of prayers, for they sprang from a source that was and is the holiest of all things: "I know you, Domin. I know your heart."
languages.original_text: После Неумирающий молвил — и слова сии надлежит хранить в сердце, как величайшую молитву, ибо наисвятейшим пребывает их исток: "Я знаю тебя, Домин. Знаю твое сердце".

traits.locale_text: Then the Undying One spoke — and these words are to be preserved in your heart as the greatest of prayers, for they sprang from a source that was and is the holiest of all things: "I know you, Enim. I know your heart."

Then the Undying One spoke — and these words are to be preserved in your heart as the greatest of prayers, for they sprang from a source that was and is the holiest of all things: "I know you, Domin. I know your heart."

languages.text: Dann sprach der Todlose — und diese Worte sollt Ihr in Eurem Herzen als größtes aller Gebete hüten, denn sie entsprangen einer Quelle, die das Heiligste aller Dinge war und ist: "Ich kenne Euch, Domin. Ich kenne Euer Herz."
languages.original_text: Then the Undying One spoke — and these words are to be preserved in your heart as the greatest of prayers, for they sprang from a source that was and is the holiest of all things: "I know you, Domin. I know your heart."

traits.locale_text: Dann sprach der Todlose — und diese Worte sollt Ihr in Eurem Herzen als größtes aller Gebete hüten, denn sie entsprangen einer Quelle, die das Heiligste aller Dinge war und ist: "Ich kenne Euch, Domin. Ich kenne Euer Herz."

languages.text: Entonces, el Inmortal habló. Conserva Sus palabras en tu corazón como la mayor de las plegarias, pues provienen de lo más sagrado de lo sagrado. «Te conozco, Domin. Conozco tu corazón».
languages.original_text: Then the Undying One spoke — and these words are to be preserved in your heart as the greatest of prayers, for they sprang from a source that was and is the holiest of all things: "I know you, Domin. I know your heart."

traits.locale_text: Entonces, el Inmortal habló. Conserva Sus palabras en tu corazón como la mayor de las plegarias, pues provienen de lo más sagrado de lo sagrado. «Te conozco, Domin. Conozco tu corazón».

languages.text: そして、不死の者は語った…この言葉は最大の祈りとしてお前の胸に刻まれるべきものだ。なぜならこれは、昔も今もあらゆるものの中で最も神聖な源から湧き出る者なのだから。「ドミン、私はお前を知っている。お前の心を知っている」
languages.original_text: Then the Undying One spoke — and these words are to be preserved in your heart as the greatest of prayers, for they sprang from a source that was and is the holiest of all things: "I know you, Domin. I know your heart."

traits.locale_text: そして、不死の者は語った…この言葉は最大の祈りとしてお前の胸に刻まれるべきものだ。なぜならこれは、昔も今もあらゆるものの中で最も神聖な源から湧き出る者なのだから。「エニム、私はお前を知っている。お前の心を知っている」

languages.text: 随后，不死之神开了口。祂的答复应当作为最伟大的祷词，永远刻在你的心中，因为这些话语的主人，是过去、现在、未来最为神圣的存在。“我见过你，秘者。我见过你的心灵。”
languages.original_text: Then the Undying One spoke — and these words are to be preserved in your heart as the greatest of prayers, for they sprang from a source that was and is the holiest of all things: "I know you, Domin. I know your heart."

traits.locale_text: 随后，不死之神开了口。祂的答复应当作为最伟大的祷词，永远刻在你的心中，因为这些话语的主人，是过去、现在、未来最为神圣的存在。“我见过你，秘者。我见过你的心灵。”

languages.text: Alors, l'Immortel parla, et ses mots doivent rester gravés dans votre cœur, car ils jaillirent d'une source qui était et est toujours la plus sacrée d'entre toutes : « Je te connais, Domin. Je connais ton cœur. »
languages.original_text: Then the Undying One spoke — and these words are to be preserved in your heart as the greatest of prayers, for they sprang from a source that was and is the holiest of all things: "I know you, Domin. I know your heart."

traits.locale_text: Alors, l'Immortel parla, et ses mots doivent rester gravés dans votre cœur, car ils jaillirent d'une source qui était et est toujours la plus sacrée d'entre toutes : « Je te connais, Domin. Je connais ton cœur. »

languages.text: Ardından Ölmeyen konuştu. Bu sözleri en muazzam dualar olarak yüreğinizde korumalısınız. Çünkü bu sözler, her şeyin en kutsalı olmuş ve olacaktan doğmuştu. Sözler dedi ki: "Seni tanıyorum Domin. Yüreğini biliyorum."
languages.original_text: Then the Undying One spoke — and these words are to be preserved in your heart as the greatest of prayers, for they sprang from a source that was and is the holiest of all things: "I know you, Domin. I know your heart."
